citations.narrative:
By a conversation with the licensee on May 3, 2023, the licensee stated that they are no longer conducting regulated
business or living at site 001. A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before
any change in the name, address, management, substantial control or ownership of his business or operation, locations,
activities, and number or type of animals. Provide Animal Care with a valid physical address where routine unannounced
inspections can take place.
Correct by September 15, 2023
This inspection report was emailed and certified mailed to a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
By a conversation with the licensee on May 3, 2023, the licensee stated that they are no longer conducting regulated 
business or living at site 001. A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before 
any change in the name, address, management, substantial control or ownership of his business or operation, locations, 
activities, and number or type of animals. Provide Animal Care with a valid physical address where routine unannounced 
inspections can take place. 
Correct by September 15, 2023 
 
This inspection report was emailed and certified mailed to a facility representative.
